ComicInfo.Summary: Her Majesty's Secret Agent: Nigel Cord meets with the leaders of the C.A.B.A.L.. Lady Pippa and Douglas Chance travel to New York to meet with Haiku. The British government plans an attack on Professor Daedalus's base.
ComicInfo.Title: Her Majesty's Secret Agent
